[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

Create gifts for other users, or open one you received.

## /gift open

**Usage**

- `/gift open gift:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `gift` | `string` | Yes | The gift to open. | - |

## /gift list

**Usage**

- `/gift list`

**Parameters**

_No parameters._

## /gift create

**Usage**

- `/gift create items:<string> [name:<string>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `items` | `string` | Yes | The items to put in this gift. | - |
| `name` | `string` | No | A name for your gift (optional). | - |

## /gift send

**Usage**

- `/gift send gift:<string> user:<user>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `gift` | `string` | Yes | The gift to send. | - |
| `user` | `user` | Yes | The user to send it to. | - |
